oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Vandergriff family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph of the Vandergriff family features Jacob J. Vandergriff of Co. A. 6th TN Mtd. Inf. wearing his reunion medal. Featured in the photograph are Jacob Vandergriff, Mary Lee Vandergriff, and R.L. and Henry Vandergriff.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vandergriff, Jacob ; Vandergriff, Mary Lee; Vandergriff, R.L." Vandergriff, Henry
